headline: Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM): Analyst Upgrade and Q3 Highlights
summary: Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) is one of the best blue-chip stocks to buy now. On November 11, 2025, Piper Sandler raised its price target on Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) to $144 from $141, maintaining an Overweight rating. The firm noted that while crude oil worries continue to weigh on sentiment, Exxon’s third‑quarter results underscore resilient […]
